profile.name: Evan You
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Performance Optimization Expert | Vite & Vue.js Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with expertise in performance optimization, web development best practices, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Proficient in TypeScript, webpack, CircleCI, and various UI component libraries.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at VoidZero
description: Developed high-performance web applications using Vite and Next.js with optimized caching mechanisms.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement robust testing frameworks and automated deployment pipelines.

experience.title: Freelance Developer (2023-2024)
description: Worked on various web development projects, including a high-profile e-commerce platform using Vue.js and Next.js.
Utilized performance optimization techniques to improve application load times by 30%.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer (2023)
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of Radix-Vue, a Vue.js port of Radix UI Primitives.
Ensured compatibility with various browsers and devices.
